name: Sight's Adventure: Verse Four
description:
OVERVIEW

The game Sight's Adventure: Verse Four is a prologue to the Sight's Adventure trilogy. You play as Sight, and travel through diverse environments, talking to people and defeating bad guys all while answering Bible trivia. 

STORY

As Sight and Christlee trek along in the game, they learn that they need to team up with a new character to take down a new threat that wants the world to feel constant pain and sorrow.

BIBLE TRIVIA

What makes this series different from a lot of other video games is that it is a Christian Bible game. It consists of periodic trivial questions and small references throughout the game for anyone to enjoy.
